value:
Past wars have left our world in ruin.
But still, together we persevere. Nohr,
Hoshido, and my dear siblings.

The royal line of Nohr is descended
from the First Dragons. As such, I will
do my duty and lead the world.

Though I am now king, I will not let
that fact change my heart. I will only
grow stronger, more disciplined.

I feel there are some similarities
between my family and the royal
family of Askr...$k$pI hope I will be able to build a good
rapport with Prince Alfonse and
Princess Sharena.

I must better myself, not only for the
sake of Nohr but so all people may
prosper... That is my goal now.

If you happen to meet anyone by the
name of Laslow or Peri, please tell
them Xander is looking for them.$k$pHere, take this as payment for
your trouble.

My axe grows sharp against the
will of my foes!

As Nohr's king, I refuse to fall behind!
I will not be outdone, even by a Hero
from another world.

My blood runs cold in my veins...
Perhaps we ought to rethink our
approach here.

What is this? A gift? I suppose
I should offer you my thanks.

I am King Xander of Nohr. My life
is devoted to battlefield perfection,
in both power and grandeur.

Do you know of my siblings? Camilla,
Leo, Elise...and Corrin, of course.$k$pThough we may have been born to
different mothers, each of them is
nevertheless dear to me.$k$pAs the eldest brother of Nohr's royal
family, I often felt I would never know
a moment's peace.$k$pOf course, that is to be expected with
the territory, but...$k$pUltimately, looking back, I am grateful
to my father for having given me so
many wonderful siblings.$k$pMy siblings taught me to love others
in a way that makes me different
from my father.$k$pWhat I mean to say is, simply that,
well... Siblings are good. And such
bonds are not for family alone.$k$pI hope to reach such a level of trust
and camaraderie with you one day
as well, $Nu.$k$pAnd I hope to build that trust not
just as the king of a nation but
simply as Xander—as your friend.
I will see your era fade.
You die here.
Take this!
Feel the bite of Bölverk!
Nohr does not die with me.
ふふ
In my reign as Nohr's new king, I vow to seek peace and understanding.
Hm? ...Ah, you wish to spar with me.
I'm a legendary Hero? To think that my name would be known across the worlds...
Prince Ryoma of Hoshido... Tell me, is he here?
Nohr is indomitable. I have no doubt that we will taste victory.
War defies all reason. It is driven by madness and greed. Yet wage war we must.
I have made my vow to seek peace and understanding. Together, you and I will bring forth a just world.
I am ready.
On my honor!
Understood.
